relation: CBS Evening News with Scott Pelley
pageTitle: District Heights Police Officer Charged In Shooting Of Suspect « CBS Baltimore
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {6935=(Copyright 2012 by The Associated Press. All Rights Reserved.), 7397=Riley is accused of shooting Kalvin Kyle in September after a traffic stop. Authorities say Riley pulled Kyle over on suspicion of riding a stolen motorcycle and put him in the back of a police cruiser as he secured the scene. As Kyle took off running, Riley allegedly shot him in the back. Kyle survived but was injured.}
